description: Creates a channel for CloudTrail to ingest events from a partner or external source. After you create a channel, a CloudTrail Lake event data store can log events from the partner or source that you specify.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The name of the partner or external event source. You cannot change this name after you create the channel. A maximum of one channel is allowed per source. A source can be either Custom for all valid non-Amazon Web Services events, or the name of a partner event source. For information about the source names for available partners, see Additional information about integration partners in the CloudTrail User Guide.

parameters.name: Destinations
parameters.description: One or more event data stores to which events arriving through a channel will be logged. (dict) --- Contains information about the destination receiving events. The type of destination for events arriving from a channel. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the value is EVENT_DATA_STORE. For service-linked channels, the value is AWS_SERVICE. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the location is the ARN of an event data store that receives events from a channel. For service-linked channels, the location is the name of the Amazon Web Services service.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of destination for events arriving from a channel. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the value is EVENT_DATA_STORE. For service-linked channels, the value is AWS_SERVICE.

nested_params.name: Location
nested_params.description: For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the location is the ARN of an event data store that receives events from a channel. For service-linked channels, the location is the name of the Amazon Web Services service.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags. (dict) --- A custom key-value pair associated with a resource such as a CloudTrail trail, event data store, dashboard, or channel. The key in a key-value pair. The key must be must be no longer than 128 Unicode characters. The key must be unique for the resource to which it applies. Value (string) --- The value in a key-value pair of a tag. The value must be no longer than 256 Unicode characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key in a key-value pair. The key must be must be no longer than 128 Unicode characters. The key must be unique for the resource to which it applies.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value in a key-value pair of a tag. The value must be no longer than 256 Unicode characters.

nested_items.name: ChannelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the new channel.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the new channel.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The partner or external event source name.

nested_items.name: Destinations
nested_items.description: The event data stores that log the events arriving through the channel.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of destination for events arriving from a channel. For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the value is EVENT_DATA_STORE. For service-linked channels, the value is AWS_SERVICE.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: For channels used for a CloudTrail Lake integration, the location is the ARN of an event data store that receives events from a channel. For service-linked channels, the location is the name of the Amazon Web Services service.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key in a key-value pair. The key must be must be no longer than 128 Unicode characters. The key must be unique for the resource to which it applies.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value in a key-value pair of a tag. The value must be no longer than 256 Unicode characters.
